name: Drive-By Hero
description: Inspired by arcade game experiences, Drive By Hero is an apocalyptic shooter game. Shoot enemies, kill bosses, use new weapons and try to survive in this horrific action game. Alone with your car and your gun, you are not the hero they deserve but the one they need.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP or later Processor: Intel Pentium 4 (2001) and above or AMD Processors after 2003 Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: Any graphics card that supports Direct X 9 or above. DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 250 MB available space Sound Card: Direct X 9 sound device
